name: @tenoxui/static-css
description: Generate static CSS file with tenoxui rules and class names.
author: NOuSantx <nousantx@gmail.com>

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && uglifyjs ./src/js/index.js -c -o dist/index.min.js --source-map "url='index.min.js.map'" --comments "/^!/" && cp src/js/index.js dist
